title: 客户端崩溃了
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  weaponlib ([打枪]Vic's Modern Warfare.jar)
  SignPictureCorePlugin ([木牌画]SignPicture-1.12.1-2.8.1-universal.jar)
  Quark Plugin ([夸克]Quark-r1.6-177.jar)
  LoadingPlugin ([黑暗]HardcoreDarkness-MC1.12.2-2.0.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! (If you haven't disabled the FoamFix coremod, try disabling it in the config! Note that this bit of text will still appear.) ([优化]foamfix-0.10.3-1.12.2.jar)
  LoadingPlugin ([随意作品]RandomThings-MC1.12.2-4.2.7.3.jar)
  AppleCore ([苹果核]AppleCore-mc1.12.2-3.2.0.jar)
  ForgePlugin ([皮肤]CustomSkinLoader_Forge-14.9.jar)
  PassableLeavesCore (PassableLeavesCore-1.12.2-1.0.0.jar)
  TransformLoader ([动态环绕]DynamicSurroundings-1.12.2-3.6.0.2.jar)
  ForgelinPlugin ([播放器前置]Forgelin-1.8.2.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// I let you down. Sorry :(

Time: 2/11/20 11:13 PM
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

net.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoaderExceptionModCrash: Caught exception from Borderless Window (borderless_window)
Caused by: java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: C:\MSertTime_Craft 2.0 [Release]\.minecraft\mods\BorderlessWindowForge_Native.dll: Can't load AMD 64-bit .dll on a IA 32-bit platform
